altTitles.en: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss

altTitles.vi: Họ Đồn Tôi Là Đại Tiểu Thư Xấu Xa

description.en: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
description.vi: 《Sau khi thức quá khuya, chạy deadline để rồi kết thúc sinh mệnh, tôi đã tái sinh thành nhân vật phản diện trong truyện tranh của mình》

altTitles.ja: 異世界薬局

altTitles.en: Parallel World Pharmacy
Other World Pharmacy
Pharmacy in Another World

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

altTitles.ja: これはゆがんだ食レポです

altTitles.en: This Is A Distorted Food Review

altTitles.ja: 迷走戦士・永田カビ グルメでGO！

altTitles.ja-ro: Meisоu Senshi Nagata Kabi - Gourmet de GO!

altTitles.en: My Wandering Warrior Eating Disorder
Straying Warrior Nagata Kabi: GO Gourmet!
Straying Warrior Kabi Nagata: GO Gourmet!

description.en:
Autobiographical essay manga from Nagata Kabi surrounding her struggles with her eating disorder and binge eating.
___
**Individual Chapter Retail Links:**
- [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/295047)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B096KNVH2V)
- [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/635039/)

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.ja: マース

description.en: Kira believes that Rei and all other men in the world are dirty. She stays away from her classmates, hiding in her art. What happens when the delinquent motorcyclist and playboy, Rei, gets ahold of one of her drawings, and actually wants to keep it?
Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.ja: けもみみみこさん

altTitles.en: Monster Girl Shrine Maidens
Animal-Eared Shrine Maidens
Who Will Win?

description.en: Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

altTitles.ja: ボツ子ちゃん
没キャラ

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

altTitles.ja: チーズ・イン・ザ・トラップ

description.en: Having returned to college after a year long break, Hong Sul, a hard-working over-achiever, inadvertently got on the wrong side of a suspiciously perfect senior named Yoo Jung. From then on, her life took a turn for the worse - and Sul was almost certain it was all Jung's doing. So why is he suddenly acting so friendly a year later?

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.ja: Chotto Dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikakete Kita

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

altTitles.en: Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!
A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
A Slightly Pushy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Slightly Clingy Dark Elf Chased Me from Another World
A Dark Elf With Love That's Only A Little Heavy Chased Me From Another World

description.en:
Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world.

One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world !! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata !! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused !! (in many ways).

Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?) !! A sweet and thick romantic comedy woven around the dark elf beauty's slightly heavy schizophrenic love !!!

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
description.id: Hinata, seorang siswa SMA yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain dan menjadi pahlawan dengan kekuatan Dewa. Mengalahkan Raja Iblis bersama Mariabel "Dark Elf", dan bersama teman-temannya. Penuhi keinginan Dewa dengan aman dan kembali ke dunia ini lagi. Satu bulan setelah itu, Hinata kembali ke dunianya, tetapi Mariabel juga datang ke sini dari dunia lain!! Alasan dia datang ke sini adalah untuk mengikuti Hinata yang dicintainya!! Dan hanya untuknya, Dia menyerang Hinata setiap kali dia menolaknya. cinta yang berat dan satu sendok teh kecemburuan!! (dalam banyak hal). Bisakah Hinata, yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup dengan Dark Elf, hidup dengan aman (?)!! Sebuah komedi romantis manis dan gravitasi yang menjalin dengan kecantikan Echizosic Dark Elf yang agak berat!!! (Manga ini terinpirasi dari manga H)
description.ja:
異世界に転生し、神の力で勇者になった高校生のヒナタ。ダークエルフのマリアベル、その仲間たちと共に魔王を討伐。無事、神の願いを叶えて現世へと帰還を果たす。
それから一カ月、現世に帰ったヒナタだったが、なぜかマリアベルが異世界からこちらに来てしまう!! こちらへ来た理由、それは愛しのヒナタと添い遂げるため!! しかも彼女、ヒナタにたいして少～～～～～しだけ重い愛と小さじ一杯分ぐらいの嫉妬心で事あるごとにヒナタを襲うのだった!!（色んな意味で）。
なし崩しでダークエルフと同棲することになったヒナタは無事（？）に暮らすことができるのか!!

ちょい重いダークエルフのエキゾチック美女と織りなす、甘くてグラビティな逆異世界同棲ラブコメ!!!

altTitles.ja: ソードガイ 装刀凱

description.en:
A woman dies a suspicious death in the forest. Her tragic child, Gai, is adopted by Amon, a master swordsmith. More than ten years later, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice, but loses his right arm in an accident while making a sword. Amon crushes the magical sword "Death Dragon" and rebuilds it as an artificial arm for Gai, but...?
A young boy accepts a cruel fate in a whirlwind of battles. Is it darkness that lies ahead for him, or...?

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

altTitles.en: Star Armor Soul Will Pass

description.en: Song Yunxiang, the last Star Soul General of the Human Race, brought the system back to the campus era.  When he was a teenager, he was blinded by the incomplete soul, because he was weak and could only watch his relatives and friends die in front of him.  In this life, he returned with a system rebirth, with 60 years of combat experience and knowledge and technology, and returned to school. From then on, he used to build mechas to fight monsters... The things that have regretted, the people who have missed, this time will not leave regrets.
description.zh: 人族最后一位星魂师宋云祥，带着系统重生回校园时代。 少年时曾因为魂脉残缺遭人白眼，因为弱小只能眼睁睁看着亲友战死在自己身前。 这一世，带着系统重生归来，拥有六十年的战斗经验和知识技术，重返校园，从此一路开挂造机甲打怪兽… 曾经后悔的事，曾经错过的人，这一次将不留遗憾。

title.en: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru

altTitles.en: Monster Mira's Second Form Is Way Too Cute

altTitles.ja: 怪人ミラの第2形態が可愛すぎる

altTitles.vi: Quái Nhân Mira Có Hình Thái Thứ Hai Dễ Thương Quá Đi!

description.en:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
description.vi: Dễ thương tương đương bất khả chiến bại! Quái nhân Mira lại tác oai tác quái hòng chiếm đoạt đai biến hình của người hùng. Nhờ việc được Tiến Sĩ cải tiến để tối ưu sức mạnh, Mira đã có được một hình thái mới, và hình thái này cưng vãi ò luôn!Đón đọc ngay câu chuyện romcom giữa hai thế lực thiện ác chí chóe không ai nhường ai nha!

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

altTitles.en: The Gourmet

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

altTitles.en: Poor Little Sister

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんの恋人になりたい妹の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan no Koibito ni Naritai Imouto no Hanashi

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình
description.pt-br: Pobre irmãzinha que arma seu onii-chan

description.en: A romance about two stubborn people that like each other.

altTitles.ja: ホーリーナイト

description.en: Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
description.ja: 「中出しのセッ●スって…超気持ちイイんだよ？」童貞の俺がハーフの女の子から、いきなり中出しを強要され!?　東京の某ミッション系短大に通う主人公の心太は、平穏且つ平凡な毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、学園に転入してきた謎のハーフ美少女リリスとの出会いにより彼の生活は大きく変化する…。理由もわからぬまま、突然リリスから濃厚なキスをされ、熱くなった股間を強く上下に動かされ…。「私が妊娠しちゃうくらい…キミの精子、たっぷり注ぎ込んで…？」心太を誘惑するリリスの本当の思惑とは…。

altTitles.en: Touhou dj - Kazenakishi
Touhou dj - Though the Wind Cries
かぜなきし

description.en:
-Do not read this doujinshi if you intend to play TH10 Mountain of Faith. This dounjinshi has spoiler.-  
  
The doujinshi tell the story of TH10 Mountain of Faith. It began roughly 2300 years ago, when Gensokyo and Japan still connected and there is no Hakurei barrier yet. The great suwa war is about to begin. Suwako Moriya is defending her position as a god against Kanako Yasaka.

title.en: Because I'm Super Lucky, I Got a Second Chance at Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Chou Koun no Oredake Jinsei Kaiki

altTitles.ja: 超幸運の俺だけ人生回帰

description.en:
Yukito Takahashi, a G-rank adventurer, has spent decades being mocked as useless because no matter how much he leveled up, his stats never improved. Even as he grew older, he dreamed of being young again and stronger, but he died during an adventure without ever getting better.

However, after his death, something unbelievable happened—a mysterious message appeared:
"A critical bug in the status system has been found. Your life will be rolled back."

With that, Yukito was sent back to his younger self, but this time, all his stats were maxed out at 9999! Now with godlike powers, Yukito can live the life he always dreamed of.

This is not your typical story of an unlucky protagonist—it's a tale of ultimate luck and overwhelming power! Get ready for a thrilling adventure where luck changes everything!

altTitles.ja: ネカマパンチ!!!

description.en: Netkama – a male who portrays himself as female online. This is what Kim Seyeong decides to become after reencountering Shin Heejae, the guy who destroyed Seyeong's gaming career in "Arcadia" a year prior. His plan is to pretend to be a girl in the game, get Heejae to fall for him, and then make the big reveal to everyone so that his archnemesis will also be humiliated out of "Arcadia" forever. But being a dude trying to become the girlfriend of your worst enemy is no easy feat, especially more so when said worst enemy starts to show a bit too much interest in you. Will Seyeong come out the victor of this scheme? Or will he find himself losing to Heejae all over again?

altTitles.ja: 小悪魔JKサイコ

altTitles.en: Little Devil Psycho Schoolgirl
Little Devil High School Psycho

description.en: After the Golden Week holiday, Kokoro Kasai, a stunningly beautiful and naturally charming high school sophomore, transfers to Shimotsuki High School. With her striking looks and engaging personality, she easily handles even the most daring conversations with a smile. Aspiring to become the student council president, Kokoro soon attracts the attention of some troublesome students with bad intentions. However, what they don't realize is that Kokoro Kasai is actually a psychopath.

title.en: The Way My Nemesis Looks At Me Is Slowly Shifting

altTitles.zh: 宿敌看我的眼神逐渐变质

altTitles.zh-ro: Sudi Kan Wo De Yanshen Zhujian Bianzhi

description.en: Yu Wan is a spoiled rich brat who was given everything and never had to work a day in her life. Her father forces her to intern at acompany where her childhood bestfriend, Ni Chang, works at. Unbeknownst to Yu Wan, Ni Chang has had a crush on Yu Wan since they were children.

title.en: Isekai Majutsushi wa Mahou o Tonaenai

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Majutsu-shi wa Mahou wo Tonaenai

altTitles.ru: Волшебник из другого мира не произносит заклинаний

altTitles.ja: 異世界魔術師は魔法を唱えない

altTitles.zh: 異世界魔術師不詠唱魔法

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Majutsushi wa Mahou wo Tonaenai

altTitles.en: The Other World's Wizard Does Not Chant

description.en:
The Magician named Yard was suddenly summoned in different world as a Hero. The sorcery in this world is behind compared to Yard who came from another world. The other summoned heroes are also unreliable. Furthermore, it is not possible to return to the former world… In such a hopeless situation, Yard chuckles to himself. Get ready, humans of this world. This world where witchcraft is behind. I have enormous toy in this box. allow me to play with it. The Villainous magician named Yard tramples down the other world with overwhelming Dark magic!  
  
[Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n5389bx/) (Raw)
description.pt-br:
O mago chamado Yard foi repentinamente convocado em um mundo diferente como um 「Herói. A feitiçaria neste mundo está atrás em comparação com Yard, que veio de outro mundo.Os outros heróis convocados também não são confiáveis. Além disso, não é possível voltar ao mundo anterior. Em tal situação desesperadora, Yard ri de si mesmo.

「Preparem-se, humanos deste mundo. Este mundo onde a bruxaria está para trás.Eu tenho um brinquedo enorme nesta caixa. deixe-me brincar com isso 」

O mago Vilão chamado Yard atropela o outro mundo com magia negra avassaladora!

altTitles.ja: 人形の国

altTitles.en: Country of Dolls

description.en: The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.
description.ja: 遺跡層におおわれた巨大人工天体「アポシムズ」。危険な「自動機械」や「人形病」に侵された者たちが彷徨う極寒の地表で暮らすエオ、ビコ、エスロー達は行軍訓練のさなか、強大なリベドア帝国の兵士に追われる不思議な少女を助ける。少女から託された「コード」と「七つの弾丸」、それは世界の運命を大きく変えるものだった……!!
description.pt:
O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In english by [Kodansha](https://kodanshacomics.com/series/aposimz/) (Print version by [Vertical](http://www.vertical-comics.com/books/aposimz_01.php))  
- In french by [Glénat](https://www.glenat.com/seinen/aposimz-la-planete-des-marionnettes-tome-01-9782344028827) as "Aposimz la planète des marionnettes"  
- In italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/notizie/articolo/aposimz/)  
- In german by [Manga Cult](https://www.cross-cult.de/titel/aposimz-land-der-puppen-1.html) as "Aposimz - Land der Puppen"  
  
**Note:** The oneshot was also translated by Kodansha: [Link](https://kodanshacomics.com/chapter/aposimz-prologue/)
description.uk: Штучне космічне тіло АПОСІМЗ приблизно 120,000 км в діаметрі. Більшу частину його об'єму становить ядро, яке захищене надструктурною оболонкою. П'ятдесят сторіч тому люди, які зазнали поразки у війні проти ядра, втратили своє законне право знаходитися на АПОСІМЗ, і були змушені жити на крижаній поверхні. Вони зіштовхнулися з безщадною ляльковою хворобою та агресивними автоматонами, котрі постійно підіймаються з рівня руїн. І навіть так, людство змогло вижити.
description.pt-br: O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem…

altTitles.ja: サキュバス奴隷との日常

altTitles.en: My Life with a Succubus Slave

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

altTitles.en: The Bugle Call

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

title.en: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru

altTitles.ja: 沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる

altTitles.en: The Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Speaks in a Heavy Dialect and It's Too Much of a Pain

altTitles.ru: Девушка, в которую я влюбился на Окинаве, говорит на очень трудном диалекте, и с ней сложно общаться

altTitles.en: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.
description.pt-br: Eu, Nakamura Teruaki, me transferi para Okinawa e estou apaixonado pela Kyan, mas não entendo seu dialeto. Higa está sempre me ajudando interpretando o dialeto... Um romance intercultural um pouco incomum em uma ilha tropical está prestes a começar!

description.en: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

title.en: Magical Explorer - Reborn as a Side Character in a Fantasy Dating Sim

altTitles.ja: マジカル★エクスプローラー エロゲの友人キャラに転生したけど、ゲーム知識使って自由に生きる

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - Reborn as a Eroge Hero's Friend, I'll Live Freely with my Eroge Knowledge

altTitles.ru: Переродившись в друга главного героя эроге, я буду жить свободно, используя мои знания эроге

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - I was reincarnated as a friend character in an eroge, but I use my knowledge of the game to live freely.
Magical★Explorer It seems I have become a Friend of the Protagonist in an Eroge World, but because Magic is fun I have abandoned the role and train myself.

altTitles.ja-ro: Magical★Explorer - Eroge no Yuujin Kyara ni Tensei Shitakedo, Game Chishiki Tsukatte Jiyuu ni Ikiru

description.en: There’s a legendary Bishoujo Game that has become popular among Japanese gentlemen. Its name is “ Magical★Explorer” or Magiero for short. The game’s protagonist has a cheat-like power with 12 different beautiful heroines to flirt with, including additional 12 heroines from the DLC, a harem of 24 beauties. I have become that protagonist!………………Not. Instead, I have become the third-wheel character who always laughing like an idiot next to him. There’s no heroine that would lay their eyes on me.    But now I couldn’t care less about the protagonist and his heroines. Why? Because I discovered magic. While I was using it, I have become interested in it. I want to master it. I want to become the strongest. Thus I have decided. I would abandon half my role as a protagonist’s friend to train my magic and then I would beat the hell out of that cheat who can solo the Demon King.    ………..I was training with that thought in mind, but somehow I keep getting closer to the heroines and furthermore, I don’t know why I keep encounter events like I am some Eroge’s protagonist.
description.ja: 伝説の美少女ゲーム『マジカル★エクスプローラー』。俺はこのゲームでチートなスキルを持つモテモテの主人公！……の横でへらへらと笑う不遇な友人キャラに転生していた…！？

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto
Le 100 ragazze che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

altTitles.en: Go! Go! Loser Ranger!

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.en: Managing a Wild Idol
Yabai Idol and Her Manager

description.en: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

altTitles.en: Eternally Regressing Knight

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: 魔王様、リトライ! R

altTitles.en: Demon Lord, Retry! R

description.en: At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world. His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils. A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.
description.ja: ダンジョンの最下層部にて、この世界の創造主と思しき存在を目の当たりにした魔王が、次に向かう先は大悪魔たちが群雄割拠する魔族領。底抜けに明るい元気っ娘・JKも新たに仲間に加わり、今回も濃厚すぎるキャラたちの個性がぶつかり合う。
description.pt-br: Entrando em uma nova série! A aventura do lorde demônio mais forte está longe de terminar. No andar mais baixo da masmorra, o Lorde Demônio ficou cara a cara com uma presença que parece ser a criadora deste mundo. Seu próximo destino é o território demoníaco, onde há uma rivalidade contínua entre demônios. Uma nova, incrivelmente enérgica e alegre colegial se juntou à gangue. Mais uma vez, as personalidades agitadas do nosso personagem e suas idiossincrasias irão colidir umas com as outras. A aguardada sequência cômica de uma adaptação em quadrinhos da fantasia popular, cheia de mal-entendidos!

title.en: Ore no Sora - The Detective Saga

altTitles.ja: 俺の空　刑事編

altTitles.en: The Sky is Mine - The Detective Saga

description.en:
Ippei Yasuda, heir to the Yasuda Zaibatsu, is back as a detective! 
Despite being a rookie Ippei takes on cases head-on, 
but is confronted by the unreasonable crimes of those in power. 
Will Ippei be able to maintain and apply his manly justice?

(from ebookjapan)

altTitles.ja: あなた達それでも先生ですかっ！

altTitles.en: You Still Call Yourselves Teachers?!

description.en: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!?
description.ja: 親が経営する旅館にある日、居候としてやってきたのは学校の先生たち!? 男子高校生・風見ヒロは旅館のため、自分の未来のためにお世話をすることに!?
description.pl: Pewnego dnia nauczyciele przychodzą jako freeloaderzy do zajazdu prowadzonego przez jego rodziców!? Kazami Hiro, uczeń szkoły średniej, postanawia zadbać o zajazd i swoją przyszłość!? Pod jednym dachem rozpoczyna się zakazana haremowa komedia romantyczna!!

altTitles.ja: アンビバレント～童貞を捨てたら死ぬ世界～

altTitles.en: Ambivalent: A World Where Losing Your Virginity Means Death

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

altTitles.ja: スマザー・ミー

description.en: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

altTitles.en: With You and the Rain

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

altTitles.en: The S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

description.en:
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

altTitles.ja: 君のドッペルゲンガー (東方)

altTitles.en: Your Doppelganger (Touhou Project)

altTitles.ja: 撮るに足らない

altTitles.en: Not Enough to Take a Photo

description.en: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.
description.ja: 先輩・丹河♀×後輩・須藤♂の２人は金欠生活に終止符を打つべくアダルト配信で一儲けしようと企むが…!?

title.en: Falling in the Night with You

altTitles.en: Fall in the Night with You
Nyx Stay Night
Nyx Stays Night
黑夜有所斯

description.en:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi’s life. The two help each other’s growth, Ren Xi’s willing to help Nyx to find her lost memories, but in the process, will discover an astonishing secret……  
  
L'apparition soudaine d'une sorcière amnésique, Nix, amène beaucoup de changements dans la vie du jeune Ren Xi. Ren Xi veut aider Nix à retrouver ses souvenirs. Cette quête leur fera découvrir un secret incroyable…
